name: MiniGalaxy
description:
This is a space exploration game with planets fully customizable and terrain randomly generated. You are lost in the deep space trying to find your way home. Luckily, you still have the knowledge in your head to rebuild everything once you have enough materials.

An individually developed 3D sandbox space exploration game, designed and implemented by me for understanding Unity 3D. The game is currently in early development, with potential unknown bugs and problems. Please leave comments about the bugs so I can fix them! :)
